N

NO_CIRCUMSTANTIAL - Static variable in class com.guardsquare.dexguard.runtime.detection.RootDetector
Don't consider circumstantial evidence as evidence of rooting, like the presence of apps that are only useful on rooted devices.

Deprecated.

NO_ROOT_MANAGERS - Static variable in class com.guardsquare.dexguard.runtime.detection.RootDetector

NO_TRICK_APPS - Static variable in class com.guardsquare.dexguard.runtime.detection.RootDetector
Don't consider applications whose sole purpose is to hide from root detection libraries.
